title: Lincoln's WARNING #100014: Social Media Algorithm Changes
script: Stop scrolling. You need to hear this... Social Media Algorithm Changes? Every headline feeds the machine that measures your attention in ad seconds. You think you consume it—truth is, it consumes you. Support truth. Bitcoin below. Social Media Algorithm Changes? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below.
